Commentary.ab: vāstrō.dataēińiiehe] cod. Geldner, Kellens vāstrō.dātainiiahe. Cf. Skt. prāvṛṣéṇya- (Debrunner, 1954, p. 504).
sarəδahe] thematized, but cf. VrS2.10 acc. sg. sarəδīm (instead of sarəδəm). Expected then *sarəδiiehe, but never attested.
arətō.kərəiϑinahe] Kellens arətō.kərəiϑinahe, Klingenschmitt, 1968: §361, Hintze, 2009: p. 113. Cf. N28.21 HJ nʾltwk kltyn', TD ʾlcwk' ḵltyn'; N72.11 HJ ltwkylytyn'.

Parallels.ab: Without the mention of the attributes to each gahanbār ~ Y1.9, Y2.9, Y3.11, Y4.14, Y6.8, Y7.12, Y17.8, Y22.12, Y24.19, Y59.8, Y66.9, VrS78.21, VrS79.14, VrS81.8, VrS82.9.
maiδiiōizarəmiiehe paiiaŋhō cf. Pahl. mēdyōzarm rōγn, rōγn ī mēdyōzarm.

Ritual.ab: On arətō.karəiϑinahe, vid. N28.21 (Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003, p. 76, 79) and N72.11 (Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003, p. 40-41):
N28.21: 10 u-š 2 abar wīsparad ī artō-kartin dādweh guft hād wīsparad ī aratō.kərəϑənnē pad cāštag
"10 (fingers of water) and two (of milk) for the Visperad ī Artōkartin. Dādweh had said: "the Vīsperad ī aratō.kərəϑən is not in the doctrine."
N72.11: 550 ud ēk tāg wīsparad ī artō-kartin dādweh guft hād ay wīsparad ī aratō.kərəϑən nē pad cāštag
"551 twigs for the Visperad ī Artōkartin. Dadwēh had said that this Vīsperad ī aratō.kərəϑən is not in the doctrine."
